sentence.Network_en: Fraternal love, sometimes almost everything , is at others worse than nothing.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin fraternalis, from Latin fraternus, from frater 'brother'

entry.tran: 兄弟的;兄弟般的;友爱的
entry.def: Fraternal actions show strong links of friendship between two people or groups of people.

example.ex: ...the fraternal assistance of our colleagues and comrades...
example.tran: 同事和朋友们对我们兄弟般的帮助

example.ex: He said he hoped the issue could be solved in a fraternal way.
example.tran: 他表示希望这个问题能以友好的方式解决。

entry.def: Fraternal twins are twins born from two eggs, so they are not exactly the same. They look different from each other and may be different sexes.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to a fraternity or society of usually men;
2. (of twins) derived from two separate fertilized ova;
3. like or characteristic of or befitting a brother;
